nodes.text: When their search for a Separatist spy lead them to Mon Gazza, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker purchased a used Podracer for his Padawan Ahsoka Tano to used during the Mon Gazza Speedway. It was destroyed during a qualifying lap by Raido. She did end up qualifying for the race, anyway, and fellow racer Kidd Kareen lent her a TurboDyne 99. The Podracer was painted green and featured cooling radiators.
